scriptmanager.objects

Class Peak

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.objects.Peak

  • public class Peak
extends java.lang.Object
    The object describing how peaks are stored for the Peak Calling tools.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    GeneTrack_BAM, PeakPair

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakChromComparator
      Comparator for chromosome name
      static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakPositionComparator
      Comparator for peak positions defined by the start coordinate.
      static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakStrandComparator
      Comparator for peak strand information: returns 1 if both peak strands are "+" returns -1 if both peak strands are "-" returns 0 for all other cases (like non-"+"/"-" strand Strings)
      static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakTagComparator
      Comparator for tag counts

    • Constructor Summary

      Peak(java.lang.String chr, int start, int stop, java.lang.String dir, int t, double std)
      Initialize with a standard deviation value

    • Field Detail

      • PeakTagComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakTagComparator
        Comparator for tag counts

      • PeakChromComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakChromComparator
        Comparator for chromosome name

      • PeakPositionComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakPositionComparator
        Comparator for peak positions defined by the start coordinate. Does not compare chr names.

      • PeakStrandComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Peak> PeakStrandComparator
        Comparator for peak strand information:
        • returns 1 if both peak strands are "+"
        • returns -1 if both peak strands are "-"
        • returns 0 for all other cases (like non-"+"/"-" strand Strings)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Peak

        public Peak(java.lang.String chr,
            int start,
            int stop,
            java.lang.String dir,
            int t,
            double std)
        Initialize with a standard deviation value
        Parameters:
        chr - the chromosome name
        start - the start coordinate of the peak (left/smaller coord index)
        stop - the stop coordinate of the peak (right/larger coord index)
        dir - the strand/direction
        t - the tag count
        std - the standard deviation value

      • Peak

        public Peak(java.lang.String chr,
            int start,
            int stop,
            java.lang.String dir,
            int t)
        Intialize without a standard deviation value
        Parameters:
        chr - the chromosome name
        start - the start coordinate of the peak (left/smaller coord index)
        stop - the stop coordinate of the peak (right/larger coord index)
        dir - the strand/direction
        t - the tag count
